*Note*: To go through the Soar Tutorial, you will need to download three things:
  # [Downloads The Soar Suite]: This contains the Soar kernel, agents that don't require an environment and the Java debugger.
  # [Domains_Eaters Eaters]: A pac-man like games used in chapter 2 of the tutorial.
  # [Domains_TankSoar TankSoar]: A tank battle game used in chapter 3 of the tutorial.
